Summary: UFO was directly overhead, not moving, then slowly went West.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy mother and I were outside in our driveway with our dog. We were looking at stars when we saw a large triangle shaped glowing object with six glowing "balls" inside. It didn't make any noise and didn't move for about 15 seconds or so, then slowly went west until I couldn't see it anymore, that taking approximately 5 or 6 seconds. I had no idea what it was. I wasn't scared of it at all.
trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Naples
There were no other sightings in Naples on or around January 1st 1974
